Title
Software Developer - Accessibility Lead, Spectrum Control Development
positions.description: Develop the user interface for IBM Spectrum Control in the IBM Spectrum Suite using Javascript, HTML, and CSS with Dojo. Implement screen reader, keyboard, and high-contrast mode accessibility in both Spectrum Control and Storage Insights to ensure compliance with IBM's accessibility standards.

given.text:
Leadership and intelligence come to mind when I think of Emma Bostian in the software development and engineering field. She leads not just through innate ability, but through sharp and effective skills that she possesses. She is also able to adapt to different software platforms/environments quickly - a skill she combines with a genuine enthusiasm for learning. Emma's tendency to teach and show others is likewise unique, and often causes others to follow her.
…
See more

received.text: I worked as an intern under Paul for six months, and feel confident saying that he is an amazing manager.  Paul truly cares about the success of his employees, and took the time to really get to know me.  He is definitely one of the best managers IBM has to offer!
